sentences.english: Extraoral vast shoals of the Pearl River waterfront, the underwater beach off the coast to slow gradient.
sentences.chinese: 珠江口外海滨滩涂辽阔，水下滩地向岸外缓慢坡降。

sentences.english: The saltwater intrusion frequently has bad effect on the development of the cities near the estuary.
sentences.chinese: 盐水入侵，盐水倒灌时常危害长江口附近城市的发展。

sentences.english: Shanghai plants at the mouth of Changjiang River.
According to measured data, the salinity intrusion in the Yangtze Estuary is analysised.
sentences.chinese: 根据实测资料分析了长江口的盐水入侵问题。

sentences.english: The water on the middle route is supposed to flow from the Danjiangkou Reservoir in Hubei.
sentences.chinese: 中线引水计划从湖北省的丹江口水库流出。

sentences.english: Another would bring water from the Three Gorges reservoir to the Danjiangkou reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面要把三峡大坝的水带入丹江口水库。

sentences.english: The Danjiangkou reservoir is the water source area of the middle route project of S-N water transfer.
sentences.chinese: 丹江口水库为南水北调中线工程水源地。

sentences.english: Sousa chinensis). Zhujiangkou Chinese White Dolphin National Nature Reserve (.
sentences.chinese: 珠江口中华白海豚自然保护区。

sentences.english: In the Danjiangkou Reservoir area, eutrophication is the major pollution.
sentences.chinese: 富营养化是丹江口水库污染治理的重点。

sentences.english: The river crossing at the Yangtze Estuary is an important component in the overall plan of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 长江口越江通道是上海城市总体规划的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The natural barrier of the Yangtze River turns out a bottleneck" restricting the fast development of the central region of Jiangsu Province."
sentences.chinese: 长江口的天堑阻隔是制约苏中快速发展的“瓶颈”。

sentences.english: Xichuan the Danjiangkou Reservoir is the source of North Water Transfer Project.
sentences.chinese: 淅川的丹江口水库是南水北调中线工程的源头。

sentences.english: Jiuduansha is a new river island.
sentences.chinese: 九段沙是长江口新生沙岛。

sentences.english: Situated in Danjiangkou, northwest Hubei, Mount Wudang is one of the famous mountains in China.
sentences.chinese: 武当山位于丹江口，西北的湖北，是我国的名山之一。

sentences.english: Danjiangkou Reservoir is the largest artificial lake in Asian.
sentences.chinese: 丹江口水库是亚洲最大的人工湖。

sentences.english: The enhanced Danjiangkou Dam is the water-source project of the mid-route of South-North Water Transfer Project.
sentences.chinese: 加高后的丹江口大坝为南水北调中线水源工程。
